category-def.name: wtp

category-def.name: wtp.bundles.sdk
category-def.label: Web Tools Platform SDK (WTP SDK) Bundles
category-def.description: These bundles are most likely include in features, but are provided here for completeness.

category-def.label: Web Tools Platform (WTP) Incubation
category-def.description: These features provide incubating functionality with the executable code only and are recommended for most users.

category-def.label: Web Tools Platform SDK (WTP SDK) Bundle Sources

category-def.name: wtp.tests
category-def.label: Web Tools Platform Tests (WTP Tests)
category-def.description: These features provide unit tests for WTP. WTP Committers, or others testing WTP, will need these in at least their PDE Targets.

category-def.name: wtp.tests.sources
category-def.label: Web Tools Platform Tests (WTP Tests) Sources
